attributes.additional_details: Just get us a new priminister
attributes.background:
We want a new prime minister who wont 
give money away or increase prices and will not change school holidays

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for the Prime Minisiter to be removed.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
